title: Hello :D

replies.body: Hi and welcome to the forums! It's nice to see you have joined. Hopefully we can talk sometime, see you around :)!
replies.body_tagged: Hi and welcome to the forums! It's nice to see you have joined. Hopefully we can talk sometime, see you around :)!

replies.body: Hello Welcome to avicus Forums!Hope you enjoy your stay around us!Feel free to post whenever and reply to others post!If you'd like to add me as a friend,click my name and a button should appear on the next page with add friend.Click that!Hope you enjoy your stay!See ya around!!!
